user_data.label: I have read and agree to the privacy policy.
user_data.description: Open privacy policy statement in a new window (in Finnish).

user_rights.label: I agree to the terms and conditions.

user_stats.label: I ensure that I have permission to data entry on behalf of the organization registering to the pilot project. I understand that my organization's data and feedback provided through the calculator can be used to help improve the calculator.

success.title: Registration request sent!
success.description: Your request has been forwarded to the maintainer. Upon successful review, you will be sent an invite to your provided email address. The review process usually takes 1-2 work days.

forgot_password.title: Change password
forgot_password.description: Input your email to change the password. Link and instructions will be sent to your email

form.success: Great! If an account exists for the email, we will email you a link to reset the password. The link is valid for three days.
